question.title: Rest Assured: Follow Redirects for POST call
question.body:
I'm using rest-assured v5.4.0 for some API tests. The POST calls I make are redirected to different API returning an initial 307. The redirected requests return a 202.I am writing tests to assert against the redirected response but I am not able to.

Response createResponse =
    given()
        .redirects().follow(true)
        .body(requestBody)
        .when()
        .post("/Path")
        .then()
        .statusCode(202)
        .extract()
        .response();

The assertion on status code fails with the Expected status code <202> but was <307> error even though I am setting .redirects().follow(true). How do I follow request redirects for POST calls and assert against the redirected response with restAssured?
